articles.title: New US jobless claims rise again as labor market cools - Reuters
articles.description: The number of Americans filing initial claims for unemployment benefits rose last week, indicating the labor market continues to cool in the year's fourth quarter.
articles.content:
NEW YORK, Dec 28 (Reuters) - The number of Americans filing initial claims for unemployment benefits rose last week, indicating the labor market continues to cool in the year's fourth quarter.
